Detailed Description

RGBA color object.

Even though solid colours do not have an alpha component we keep it 4 components for global compatibility.

There are in fact 16 standard web color names however two colors go under different names so there is 18 constants beginning with HTML_*.

Author:
Elliot Chance

static ConvertColorToAbsolute ( $  red,
$  green,
$  blue,
$  alpha = 0 
) [static]

Convert absolute or percentage color components into absolute color components.

Parameters:
$red Red value (0 - 255 OR 0.0 - 1.0)
$green Green value (0 - 255 OR 0.0 - 1.0)
$blue Blue value (0 - 255 OR 0.0 - 1.0)
$alpha Alpha value (0 - 127 OR 0.0 - 1.0)
Returns:
A new array with 4 elements representing red, green, blue and alpha respectivly.
